General.Name: Steel Strips Wheels Limited
General.Description: Steel Strips Wheels Limited engages in the design, manufacturing, and sale of automotive wheels in India and internationally. The company provides steel wheel rims, alloy wheel rims, and hot rolling mills for two and three wheelers, passenger cars, multi utility vehicles, tractors, commercial vehicles, and OTR vehicles. Steel Strips Wheels Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Chandigarh, India.

2.Name: Mr. Manohar Lal Jain FCA, FCS
2.Title: Compliance Officer & Whole Time Director
